attributes.action: Stop funding and entering the Eurovision Song Contest
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following this years' Eurovision Song Contest, I am petitioning for cessation of our entry and our funding of it.

Quite clearly the voting is a farce in most cases (countries who are "friends" scratching each other's backs).  Also, the political aspect to the "contest" is unacceptable.

Having the greatest song does not guarantee winning, therefore it is not a competition but a shambles.

To think we are paying for this, via the TV licencing fee, makes me sick.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
